title: Awesome News
content: I think I may be a grandfather soon!
author: Lord of Awesome

title: Good News
content: My daughter might be telling me she is pregnant tonight!
author: King of Awesome

title: So So News
content: I may or may not be a grandpa soon.
author: Patrick T. Fortunato Jr.

title: Bad News
content: My daughter is not married at this time.
author: Patrick Fortunato

title: Crappy News
content: My daughter has a boyfriend who is kind of a jerk.
author: Annoyed Father

title: Old News
content: Although I don't care for my daughter's boyfriend, she loves him.
author: Resigned Father
